subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: After being unresponsive from a knee to the head, Álvaro Pereira insisted on playing through Uruguay’s game with England, and was allowed to continue, a decision that drew criticism.
snippet: After being unresponsive from a knee to the head, Álvaro Pereira insisted on playing through Uruguay’s game with England, and was allowed to continue, a decision that drew criticism.
